meanings.definition: The quality or state of lying in the same plane.
meanings.sent1: The coplanarity of the shapes made them fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The coplanarity of the road and the sidewalk made it easy to walk alongside.
meanings.sent3: The coplanarity of the pizza slices on the plate made them look like a delicious puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The coplanarity of the stars in the night sky created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The coplanarity of the cards in the deck made shuffling them a breeze.

meanings.sent1: The coplanarity of the triangles helped in solving the geometry problem.
meanings.sent2: The coplanarity of the buildings in the city skyline was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The coplanarity of the books on the shelf made them look like a colorful staircase.
meanings.sent4: The coplanarity of the leaves on the tree created a beautiful canopy.
meanings.sent5: The coplanarity of the papers on the desk made it easier to organize them.

meanings.definition: The condition of being on the same plane.
meanings.sent1: The coplanarity of the map and the table made it convenient to plan the route.
meanings.sent2: The coplanarity of the mirror and the wall made the room look bigger.
meanings.sent3: The coplanarity of the cookies on the tray made them appear like a tasty mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The coplanarity of the petals on the flower created a symmetrical beauty.
meanings.sent5: The coplanarity of the screens on the laptops made them stack neatly.
